title: Inquire About a Home Equity Line of Credit (HELOC)
description: A homeowner wants to learn about the bank's HELOC product and how to apply.

tasks.description: Explain the key features of a HELOC, such as the draw period, repayment period, and variable interest rate.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly and accurately explains how a HELOC works.

tasks.description: Provide the current indicative interest rates for the HELOC product.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gives the customer the current starting rate.

tasks.description: Outline the application process and the documentation required (e.g., proof of income, mortgage statement).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly lists the steps and documents needed to apply.
